name: Sustain Defence
description:
Keep your turret, generator and yourself alive by killing hordes of zombies that drop healing pills.

Controls -

A and D - Left and Right

W - Jump

E - Pick up/Throw Healing Pills

Space - Shoot

Q - Re-position Turret

Made for Ludum Dare 46 - 
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/sustain-defence
